Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-14459 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.7.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-14459 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.7.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.7.0-1, affected by CVE-2025-14459
